entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
